A guest on the Jeremy Kyle Show left his girlfriend devastated after it was revealed he had fathered a second love child during an affair. 
The host was left baffled by Richard, who denied lying to his partner Melissa - who he's been with for eight years and has two children with - and insisted he simply "kept it away from her". 
After getting his words confused and insisting he would "pass that DNA test" despite being there for a lie detector, the cheat went on to fail all the questions. The guest fathered a second love child (Photo: ITV) Melissa was left heartbroken (Photo: ITV) She only knew about one love child (Photo: ITV) 
After denying having a second love child, it later emerged he told Jeremy's team he had, but that Melissa didn't know about the child. Read More 
"I haven't actually fathered them, because I don't see them," he outrageously said. Richard failed every test on the lie detector (Photo: ITV) The couple have been together for eight years (Photo: ITV) 
"I'm not a monster... I didn't lie to her, I just kept it away from her." 
It was also revealed that Melissa "catfished" her man to see if he was cheating, and he sent her an explicit picture. Jeremy wasn't impressed (Photo: ITV) She was shocked by the results (Photo: ITV) 
However, he insisted it wasn't cheating because it was his partner - despite him not realising this until afterwards. 
"Everyone makes mistakes," he said. "I'm not a robot, am I? I do wrong things. I don't meant to do them, but I do." Like us on Facebook
